title: Intensive Short-Term Neurosurgery Core Concepts Course Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational human anatomy knowledge
context.additional_context: Implementation of flipped learning for non-degree course participants in a smartphone-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic neurosurgical concepts by watching 5-minute or shorter video lectures with 80% or higher completion.
Learners respond to 70% or more of embedded quizzes to immediately apply core content.
Participation in weekly seminar sessions enables learners to apply content to real-world scenarios through team-based case analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
